attributes.action: include Scooch's eurovision entry video and publications of the like within the terms of the proposed obscene publications act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our 2007 Eurovision entry by Scooch is a piece of material which has clearly slipped through the cracks within our media's censorship system.  While i agree with freedom of the press and freedom of the individual, i do not think it right or propper that individuals or groups of individuals should be allowed to produce obscene material discrediting a nations musical talent in this way.

I hereby request that this material be included in that banned by the proposed Obscene Publications Act.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
